job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: <p>As an&nbsp;<strong>Senior Software Engineer - OnLink</strong>&nbsp;for&nbsp;<strong>John Deere</strong>'s&nbsp;<strong>Intelligent Solutions Group (ISG)</strong>&nbsp;you will be the technical Leader for the development of the&nbsp;<strong>OnLink&nbsp;</strong>product that enables golf course professionals to plan, monitor, and complete the work to maintain the golf course and their business operations.&nbsp;Our Staff Engineers are technical leaders – designing and developing production software, championing software development practices and mentoring/coaching the team members on industry trends.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;An ideal candidate will be someone with a passion for being in the code and a demonstrated history of technical leadership in delivering global software products.</p><p><br></p><p>Here is a link to learn more about the OnLink application - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c2RDLV-5y1s</p><p><br></p>
